text.english: You have tested my heart; You have visited me in the night; You have tried me and have found nothing; I have purposed that my mouth shall not transgress. Concerning the works of men, By the word of Your lips, I have kept away from the paths of the destroyer.
text.arabic: جَرَّبْتَ قَلْبِي. تَعَهَّدْتَهُ لَيْلاً. مَحَّصْتَنِي. لاَ تَجِدُ فِيَّ ذُمُوماً. لاَ يَتَعَدَّى فَمِي. تَمَسَّكَتْ خَطَواتِي بِآثَارِكَ فَمَا زَلَّتْ قَدَمَايَ.
